title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.


### OS

_No response_

title: [PR] add further model providers, dev container and CodeRabbit reviews

This pull request introduces additional options for running models and improves the development workflow.


**LM Studio** is now supported as an alternative to Ollama for running models locally. LM Studio supports the MLX engine, enabling native model execution on macOS.

title: After upgrading to 2026.1.0 my voice assistant responds “Error talking to OpenAI”
summary:
### The problem

My voice assistant is configured to use OpenAI. I restarted HA again and cycled power to the voice assistant to no avail. It was working just prior to upgrading to HA 2026.1.0. Now it just responds “Error talking to OpenAI”.

Here is the error in the log file when I say "Hey Jarvis"
